```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
helper <- function(data) {
  print(sum(!is.na(unique(data))))
  print(sum(is.na(data)))
  print(class(data))
}
```

```{r}
INST_CHARS_DIR_2024_25 <- read_csv("data/custom_data/INST_CHARS_DIR_2024_25.csv",
                                   show_col_types = FALSE)
head(INST_CHARS_DIR_2024_25)

INST_CHARS_DIR_2024_25 %>%
  count(`HD2024.Highest degree offered`) %>%
  filter(n > 1)
helper(INST_CHARS_DIR_2024_25$`HD2024.Highest degree offered`)
```
